briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Varenicline in Smokers With Cardiovascular Disease Who Wish to Quit Smoking
officialTitle: A 12-Week, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter Study With A 40 Week Follow Up Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of Varenicline Tartrate 1 Milligram (Mg) Twice Daily (BID) for Smoking Cessation in Subjects With Cardiovascular Disease
summary: The primary purpose of this study is to determine whether or not varenicline will help people with cardiovascular disease quit smoking and to confirm it is safe in these patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Responders With Carbon Monoxide (CO) Confirmed 4-week Continuous Quit Rate (CQR) for Last 4 Weeks of Treatment (Trtmt)
